DOC.brief_title: Incidence Recall After Procedural Sedation With Propofol Emergency Department
DOC.detailed_description: After procedural sedation fracture joint dislocation reduction use propofol , adult patient recall assess standardised form . This recall assessment realise 2 hour ( +/- 15 minute ) procedural sedation day . The primary outcome measure recall incidence 2 hour ( +/- 15 minute ) procedural sedation . A secondary outcome recall incidence one day procedural sedation . The recall define positive answer third question Sandin form ( Lancet . 2000 ; 355 ( 9205 ) :707-11 ) .
DOC.criteria: Adults patient ( > 18 year old ) procedural sedation emergency department use propofol fracture joint dislocation reduction Patients receive initial injection Propofol slow intravenous injection 1 mg/kg 20 second Inclusion less 2 hour injection Propofol Patients sign consent participate study Patients cover social security .
